abstract: Shares in Motorola rose 6 percent on Wednesday after billionaire investor Carl Icahn said he had raised his stake in the company to 9.9 percent from 8.75 percent, Reuters reported.
snippet: Shares in Motorola rose 6 percent on Wednesday after billionaire investor Carl Icahn said he had raised his stake in the company to 9.9 percent from 8.75 percent, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Shares in Motorola rose 6 percent on Wednesday after the billionaire investor,  Carl C. Icahn,  said he had raised his stake in the company to 9.9 percent from 8.75 percent, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Motorola Shares Up on Icahn Stake Raise
